OrgName: Disney Human Resources Strategies and Services, LLC
activities:
(1) The Workscape Compensation Management System will process employee data for the purpose of compensation planning and management.
(2) A system for processing HR data (“Global Staffing”) for recruiting purposes and for applicant information management.
(3) A database containing labor resource information (“HR Analytics”), used for the purpose of reporting and monitoring workforce performance.
(4) A File transfer system (“GlobalScape”), used for the purpose of transferring email files related to labor resources information.
(5) A web-based program publishing HR data in an organization chart format (“OrgPublisher WebAdmin”) that is accessed by HR leaders through the internet.
(6) An application information management system (“Chequed”) processing personal information for the purpose of verifying job applicant references.
(7) An enterprise application processing HR data (“Continuity Logic”) for the purpose of assessing risk, compliance and continuity for business continuity management.
(8) A central repository (“Global Mobility”) storing Human Resource data for the purpose of managing the relocation and re-assignment process.
(9) A .NET website (.NET Platform) for generating annual compensation letters and accessing employee contact information.
(10) A tool (“Cluen”) used by the executive and talent sourcing teams to manage recruiting data and candidate relationships throughout the sourcing and recruiting process.
contactoff1: The Walt Disney Company Privacy Compliance Office
contacttitle1: Assistant General Counsel - Chief Trust Officer
corpofftitle1: Vice President, HR Business Process & Reporting
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Offline and online data, including data relating to employees of entities affiliated with Disney Human Resources Strategies and Services, LLC.
